about_the_game:
Cursed School

Genre: Horror Adventure
Platform: PC (Windows only)

Game Description

Cursed School invites players to escape a mysterious school shrouded in dark curses. The protagonist navigates this eerie environment, uncovering unsettling secrets and the sinister plot behind the cursed school. The story unfolds through various choices, leading to multiple endings and ensuring high replay value.

The game features simple mini-games and puzzle elements, challenging players to solve various tasks. Successfully completing puzzles and mini-games will yield clues and items crucial for escape.

Additionally, jump scare elements are hidden throughout, enhancing the sense of tension. Unexpected moments of horror will keep players on edge, making their hearts race.

Cursed School offers a unique horror experience viewed through the eyes of a student, maximizing fear through its gripping narrative and immersive adventure.

short_description: Cursed School is an indie horror game where Hyun-soo and his friends accidentally enter a cursed school filled with dark forces. They face terrifying choices that lead to multiple endings. Unravel the secrets and escape the demon’s grasp. Can you survive this nightmare?
